item.title: Hydro-mechanical Fuel Scavenge Systems – Center Tank Empty

numlitem.para: Center tank quantity indication is operative.

placard.para: Placard below Captain’s PFD on P-1-1 panel: "SCAVENGE PUMPS INOP". Enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

note.para: The hydro-mechanical system includes two jet pumps and two float valves in each system. If the pump is inoperative or either float valve is inoperative closed, that system will not transfer fuel from the center tank making the system inoperative. With either float valve inoperative open, it may be necessary to deactivate system to prevent the unwanted fuel transfer from center wing tank to inboard main tank(s).

numlitem.para: Defuel the center tank using the pressure defueling procedure and drain the remaining center tank fuel (approximately 125 gallons) through the sump drain (AMM 28-26-00/201).
If it is necessary to deactivate system, remove the fuel strainers per DMP 28-15-2-0-2.
